title: Great 2/1 House - Walk To Park & Beltline - Fenced Yard - Hardwoods
posting_body: ['Please do a drive-by first, after that we can set up a showing.', '1783 Brewer Blvd, Atlanta, GA 30310', '=====================================================================', '2Br/1Ba Charming, bungalow, walk to Beltline, hardwood floors, fenced-in back yard, cute kitchen, nice dining room, carport.', 'Just minutes to downtown Atlanta, GA Tech, GSU, and Clark University.', '- Great living room with with beautiful hardwood floors', '- Nice dining room', '- Kitschy bathroom with a new vanity.', '- Nice-size kitchen with gas range, fridge with a water and ice dispenser', '- Beautiful hardwood floors throughout the house', '- Fenced-in back yard great for relaxing, gardening and your dogs', '- Off street parking with a carport', '- Nice size bedrooms with big closets', '- Washer/dryer in place', '- Tons of storage in attic and basement', '- Security alarm system in place', '- Close to Oakland City Marta Rail Station / Ft.', 'McPherson redevelopment area', '- Minutes away from 85, GSU & GA Tech', '- Nice, quiet neighborhood with beautiful houses', '- Few steps from Perkerson Park (Frisbee-Golf, Tennis, Atlanta Beltline)', 'Located just minutes from Downtown Atlanta, East Atlanta Village, Grant Park, Little 5 Points and the new Edgewood and Moreland retail districts.', 'Great downtown living.', '3 min.', 'from 75/85 and 20.', '10 Min.', 'away from Hartsfield International Airport.', 'Ready To Move In: August 1st 2022', 'Rent: $1,095 / Security Deposit: $500 / Pet Fee: $300', "Due Upon Move-In: 1st and last month's rent, plus security deposit (Total $2,690)", 'Application fee: $25 pp', 'Term: One year lease or longer', 'Utilities: Not included in the rent (water, gas, electricity)', 'Address: 1783 Brewer Blvd, Atlanta, GA 30310']
